√sūd 'put in order'

[present: sūdate  ]

perfect: suṣūde  suṣūdima  súṣūdati etc.  súṣūdat etc.  suṣūdáta  

aorist: [3.] asūṣudanta  

[future: sūdiṣyati  sūditā  ]

secondary: intensive: soṣūd-   -- desiderative: suṣūdiṣa-   -- causative: sūdáyati etc. V.+  sūdáyate etc. E.+  

derivatives: -sūd  sū́da V.+  -sūdaka E.+  sūdin B.  sū́dana V.+  sūdayitnú RV.
